channel.title: NPCs will absolutely not move!
channel.description: I have a 317 delta server I'm working on. My npcs will not move no matter what I do, I know to set the parameters and such but that doesn't even work. I saw something for PI's that made me think that the problem could be in the npchandler. Can anybody help?

item.title: NPCs will absolutely not move!
item.dc:creator: @Donald8274 Donald8274
item.description:
@Donald8274 wrote:

I actually had the same problem for 2 days before realizing one thing. Make sure your ranges go like this:

X1 = how far EAST you would like the NPC to go.
Y1 = how far NORTH you would like the NPC to go.
X2 = how far WEST you would like the NPC to go.
Y2 = how far SOUTH you would like the NPC to go.

Also, make sure the walktype is set to able to walk instead of stationairy. Not sute what numbers correspond with it but try 0, 1, and 2.

Read full topic

item.title: NPCs will absolutely not move!
item.dc:creator: @French_Fries French Fries
item.description:
@French_Fries wrote:

In autospawn.cfg did you put the move section to 0

item.title: NPCs will absolutely not move!
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

See what the NpcHandler is looking for in the .cfg file. Like what does the 10 in “spawn = 429 2131 2333 0 0 10”
